response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I believe it could be equally valuable to you, given your interests and needs. Considering its rarity and quality, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a special opportunity, and I trust that you will find the product's benefits and features to justify this investment. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 15000}
